text: mesema samanayan taba namadinnangen bohomayak dena (tamanma) tamange daruvanva mara dæmima ovun alamkaravat lesa dakina se ovunge devivarun æti kara, ovunva patalayehi tallu kara, ovunge dharmayada avul kara dæmuha. allah adahas kara tibune nam, ovun mese karannata ida notibini. ebævin (nabiye!) oba ovunvada ovunge boru kiyamanda visi kara damanu
